s.text: Furthermore, a significant proportion of the fibroblasts used in the study by Keerthisingam et al. [ 21 ] were obtained from patients with systemic sclerosis, which makes their fibroblast population more heterogeneous.
This study differed from ours in that a different stimulus was used.
Comparisons between HF-IPF and HF-NL were done using the Mann-Whitney test.
